short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Random Color Generator is a tool that creates random color codes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A random color generator is a tool that, as the name suggests, generates random colors. It works like a digital paintbrush dipping into an infinite palette, picking a completely new color each time.
